HOLA! Investor Welcome to iSMart, Ready to learn something new?
Low Risk, Low Return Investment You know, every second individual in US owns a mutual fund unit and in India, only 4 out of 100 people buy units of mutual funds.
Moderate Risk, Moderate Return If you had invested Rs 10,000 in Eicher Motors(the company that makes Enfield bikes), your investment will be worth Rs 1.5 crore now.
High Risk, High Return In 2010, 1 bitcoin= Rs 6 Now, 1 Bitcoin= Rs 5 lakh (OMG, Yes it\'\s true)
